ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISNEW(), OR( ISPICKVAL(animalos__Type__c, "Dog"), ISPICKVAL(animalos__Type__c, "Cat") ), NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(animalos__Age_Group__c, "Young Adult 6 mths - 1 yr"), ISPICKVAL(animalos__Age_Group__c, "Adult 1 yr - 8 yrs"), ISPICKVAL(animalos__Age_Group__c, "Senior 8 yrs+") ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Age Group must be Young Adult, Adult or Senior if Type is Dog or Cat.
